text: They say the holy water's watered down And this town's lost its faith Our colors will fade, eventually So if our time is running out Day after day We'll make the mundane a masterpiece Oh my, my Oh my, my love I take one look at you You're taking me out of the ordinary I want you laying me down To the dead and buried On the edge of your knife Staying drunk on your vibe The angels up in the clouds Are jealous knowing we found Something so wild, but the ordinary You got me kissing the ground Though your sanctuary Shattered me when you touched Oh Lord, return me to dust The angels up in the clouds Are jealous knowing we found Hopeless hallelujah Hopeless sign of heaven's gate Oh my life, how do you Breathe and take my breath away At your altar I will pray You're the sculptor, I'm the clay Oh my, my You're taking me out of the ordinary I want you laying me down To the dead and buried On the edge of your knife Staying drunk on your vibe The angels up in the clouds Are jealous knowing we found Something so wild, but the ordinary You got me kissing the ground Though your sanctuary Shattered me when you touched Oh Lord, return me to dust The angels up in the clouds Are jealous knowing we found Something so heavenly Higher than ecstasy Whenever you're next to me Oh my, my Always in black and white Until I saw your light I thought you had to die to find Something so wild, but the ordinary I want you laying me down To the dead and buried On the edge of your knife Staying drunk on your vibe The angels up in the clouds Are jealous knowing we found Something so wild, but the ordinary You got me kissing the ground Though your sanctuary Shattered me when you touched Oh Lord, return me to dust The angels up in the clouds Are jealous knowing we found Thanks for watching!

sentiment_analysis_results.sentence: They say the holy water's watered down
We'll make the mundane a masterpiece
You're taking me out of the ordinary
The angels up in the clouds are jealous knowing we found something so wild
Oh Lord, return me to dust
Something so heavenly higher than ecstasy

chapters.headline: The Struggle Between Faith and Love
chapters.summary: The text explores themes of loss of faith, the mundane nature of life, and the transformative power of love.
